custom_expected: [ FREE PASS ]

title: Build Installation Instructions
custom_steps: You install the build! (via Debug Settings > Game > Install Package)
custom_expected: [ FREE PASS ]

title: Verify: Selecting MLB.tv successfully opens MLB.tv
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "MLB" app from the menu
custom_expected: THEN the "MLB" app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.tv app can be accessed while the Playstation is connected wirelessly
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the MLB app from the menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.tv app can be accessed while the Playstation is connected using a wired connection
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the MLB.tv app from the app menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.tv app will open successfully

title: Favorite team selected on startup
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the app AND selects Get started AND selects a Favorite team AND proceeds past the Follow Teams menu
custom_expected: THEN the user lands on the Home Team screen.

title: Favorite team NOT selected on startup
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the app AND Selects Get started AND Selects Next on the Select a Favorite team screen (not selecting a favorite team) AND Proceeds past the follow teams
custom_expected: THEN the user lands on the Select a Favorite Team Modal Message (HOME).

title: Splash screen/Get Started - User not logged in
custom_steps: WHEN we launch app from PS4 dashboard
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the Get Started screen and it appears as expected Zeplin design: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/screen/593f05037e35c4dac9ddbd4c

title: On Boarding Skipped - User logged in
custom_steps: WHEN we launch the app from PS4 dashboard
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken directly into Scores View or Home Team View (per preference - skipping On Boarding at launch is a PASS)

title: Get Started Button
custom_steps: WHEN we activate the Get Started button
custom_expected: THEN We land on Alerts set up page AND When user selects an alert preference the user jumps to the Select your Favorite Team page

title: Log In Button
custom_steps: WHEN we activate the Log In button
custom_expected: THEN we jump to the Log In page

title: Create free Account Button
custom_steps: WHEN we activate the Create free Account button
custom_expected: THEN we jump to the Create free Account page

title: Get Started / On boarding remains visible until Scores screen is viewed
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the app again
custom_expected: THEN the app lands on the Get Started / On Boarding flow again. AND if the user hards quits on the Pick Favorite Team/Follow menu WITHOUT making any selections, THEN the app lands on the Get Started / On Boarding flow again.

title: Favorite Team - Navigation and Appearance
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects each team AND attempts to navigate to a Favorite AND observes the page
custom_expected: THEN every team can be chosen and cleared AND highlighted buttons appear as expected in both "chosen" and "cleared" states AND non-highlighted buttons appear as expected in both "chosen" and "cleared" states AND the Favorite team CAN be deslected AND everything appears as expected/designed Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/dashboard?q=favorite

title: From Favorite Team to Following Teams - Favorite Selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a team by highlighting it then pressing X button AND presses the [Next] button
custom_expected: THEN the app will jump to Following Teams AND the Favorite is shown on this page

title: From Favorite Team to Following Teams - No Favorite Selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user does not pick a Favorite AND presses the [Next] button to move to Follow Teams
custom_expected: THEN the app will jump to Following Teams AND a Favorite does not appear

title: BACK button
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects and activates the BACK button
custom_expected: THEN the app will jump back to the Splash Screen

title: Following Teams - Navigation and Appearance
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects each team AND deselects each AND observes the page
custom_expected: THEN every team can be chosen and cleared AND highlighted buttons appear as expected in both "chosen" and "cleared" states AND non-highlighted buttons appear as expected in both "chosen" and "cleared" states AND everything appears as expected/designed Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/dashboard?q=following

title: Following Teams  - Navigation with Favorite
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Favorite tile
custom_expected: THEN the Favorite team tile appears in the style of the team's colors

title: NEXT to Scores View/Today - Favorite/Followed Selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a team AND then selects and activates the NEXT button
custom_expected: THEN the app will jump to Home view AND the Home view defaults to your Favorite team AND in Settings > Pick Your Favorite Team > the correct teams are tagged Favorite/Followed as expected

title: NEXT to "Select a Favorite Team" Modal - No Favorite/Followed Teams
custom_steps: WHEN the selects and activates the NEXT button (has not Followed any teams)
custom_expected: THEN the app will jump to the Select Favorite Team modal view AND when confirming in Scores view (may need to check alt days in which Favorite/Followed teams appear) the correct teams are __NOT__ tagged Favorite/Followed AND in Settings/Pick Your Favorite Team the correct teams are __NOT__ tagged Favorite/Followed

title: BACK button
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects and activates the BACK button
custom_expected: THEN the app will jump back to the Favorite Team Picker

title: Appearance
custom_steps: WHEN observing the Log in Page
custom_expected: THEN all design and all copy appear as expected .

title: Log in to MLB.TV account
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an entitled MLB.com account AND the correct password AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app logs the user in AND advances to the Successful Login In screen AND OK jumps user to Favorites

title: Log in to Free Account
custom_steps: WHEN we enter a free MLB.com account AND the correct password AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app logs the user in AND advances to the Successful Login In screen AND OK jumps user to Favorites

title: Failed Log in
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an incorrect email AND any password password AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error overlay: _Account Activation - The account name or password was incorrect. Please verify login credentials and try again._ AND this can be dismissed AND the user remains on the Login Page NOTE: Repeat above test but use a correct email/incorrect password combo before passing this test . Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/dashboard?tag=Log%20In

title: Cancel
custom_steps: WHEN we activate Cancel
custom_expected: THEN we return to the Splash screen.

title: Create Account
custom_steps: WHEN we activate [Create a free Account] button
custom_expected: THEN we jump to the Create Account page

title: Appearance
custom_steps: WHEN observing the Create Account Page
custom_expected: THEN all design and all copy appear as expected . Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/dashboard?tag=Create%20Account

title: Create Free MLB.TV account - opt in newsletter
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an email address AND create a PW 8-15 characters in length with at least one upper-case letter, one lowercase letter and one number AND confirm password
custom_expected: THEN the app logs the user in AND the user's email account does not show an opt-in to receive the newsletter To confirm this, user must forward opted-in email account to CDQA member with Rodeo Tool access (Brandon/Tree) asking them to confirm that it has been tagged with opt-in group â€œ428â€￾.

title: Create Free MLB.TV account - opt out of newsletter
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an email address AND create a PW 8-15 characters in length with at least one upper-case letter, one lowercase letter and one number AND confirm password
custom_expected: THEN the app logs the user in AND the user's email account does not show an opt-in to receive the newsletter To confirm this, user must forward opted-in email account to CDQA member with Rodeo Tool access (Brandon/Tree) asking them to confirm that it has _NOT_ been tagged with opt-in group â€œ428â€￾.

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Email
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an invalid email (leave out an @ sign or the .com) AND any password 8-15 Characters in length & proper format (one number/upper-case letter/lower-case letter) AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error: Your e-mail address must be in the format of name@domain.com. Please enter your password. AND user can enter info or cancel Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/dashboard?tag=Create%20Account

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Length
custom_steps: WHEN we enter a valid email address AND any password in violation of the requirements - 8-15 Characters in length, one number, at least one upper-case & one lower-case letter AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error overlay for length violation: _Password Length - Password must be at least 8 and no more than 15 characters_ AND this can be dismissed AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Bad Format
custom_steps: WHEN we enter a valid email address AND any password 8-15 Characters in length BUT in violation of the requirements (missing requirement of one number, at least one upper-case & one lower-case letter) AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error message for length violation: _Password too simple - Password must at east one character, one number, one uppercase letter and one lowercase letter_ AND this can be dismissed AND the user is returned to Create Account Page **Note** We will need to update this test case depending on where this ticket goes - https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/MLBUWP-632

title: Create Account Failure - Existing Account
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an existing MLB.com email AND any password 8-15 Characters in length & proper format (one number/upper-case letter/lower-case letter) AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error: An account already exists. Please log in. AND user can renter their info or cancel. Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/dashboard?tag=Create%20Account

title: Cancel
custom_steps: WHEN we activate Cancel
custom_expected: THEN we return to the Splash Screen.

title: Login: Verify Login message opens; if mlb.com user account is not logged in and attempts to access game content
custom_steps: WHEN the app is Launched AND any Live or archived game tile is selected AND feed button (audio or video) is selected to launch playback
custom_expected: THEN we will be presented with a MLB.TV Login Required dialog AND the following text will appear: **MLB.TV Login Required** An active MLB.TV subscription is required to watch this game. To purchase a subscription, go to http://MLB.com/ps4 AND a LOG IN button will display underneath that takes user to the login screen.

title: Login: Verify Login message opens; when Selecting LOG IN button (in Settings)
custom_steps: WHEN we select Settings from the Global Nav menu (via menu controller button) AND select LOG IN button
custom_expected:
THEN we will be presented with a Log In screen
AND all text and graphics match the approved design
AND an Email Address field will be present
AND a password field will be present
AND a LOG IN button will display underneath with a CANCEL button beside it


Zeplin link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/dashboard?tag=Log%20In

title: Login: Verify Login success
custom_steps: WHEN we access the MLB.tv app AND we go to Settings and select SIGN IN AND we enter valid mlb.com credentials
custom_expected: THEN the credentials will be accepted AND we will be logged in AND we sill see "Successful Login" page - https://zpl.io/aXYmr9g AND when we hit OK we are returned to app

title: Login: Verify Login failed
custom_steps: WHEN we access MLb.tv AND we enter invalid MLB.com credentials
custom_expected: THEN a Login Error Message will appear under the Password field AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be stated AND all formatting and text will be readable Zeplin Link: https://zpl.io/VDld973

title: Login: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Text AND we look at the buttons
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the text is spelled correctly on the page AND each label is formatted correctly . Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5824f011ca90f0807b4022bd/dashboard?tag=Log%20In

title: Login: Verify after incorrectly entering credentials the user is able to enter credentials again
custom_steps: WHEN we see the login error text
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to navigate back to the Email and password fields AND we will be able to attempt to enter credentials again

custom_steps: WHEN we press the Back (Circle) button
custom_expected: THEN we will be returned to the previous screen.

title: Login: Pressing the Cancel button from the Login Screen returns the user to the previous screen
custom_steps: WHEN we press the Cancel button
custom_expected: THEN we will be returned to the previous screen.

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters a Free MLB.com User account (upon Login request) AND enters the Free MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: Free User / Non- Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to play FGOTD LIVE streams
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Today's FGOTD asset AND activates the media content
custom_expected: Playback will be initiated

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to play FGOTD VOD archives
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Any Date's FGOTD VOD asset AND activates the media content
custom_expected: Playback will be initiated for any/all available FGOTD VOD archives

title: FGOTD Ads trigger - Pre-Roll Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: FGOTD Asset must Show Freewheel served pre-roll video ads to user before Playback begins

title: Trigger - Replay Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates through Content Files AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Replay Assets from previously played games THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Replay media content
custom_expected: Replay Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Replay playback begins

title: Trigger - Game Highlights Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates through Content Files AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Highlights Assets from previously played games THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Game Highlight media content
custom_expected: Game Highlight Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Game Highlight playback begins

title: Non-FGOTD Game Sign-in Notification for Free User/Non-Entitlement account
custom_steps: 1. In Games View, navigate to an active live game 2. Open to Feed Select 3. Attempt launch of all available Audio and Vide Feeds
custom_expected: Each feed returns "Subscription Required" Message Confirm the messaging is as expected: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89355557

title: Premium Yearly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

custom_expected: THE Premium yearly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

title: Premium Yearly account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games

custom_expected: THEN playback launches to full screen

MLB Single Team subscribers, click your team's broadcast. New users please visit www.mlb.com/devices. See current json file for most current expected messaging: Prod http://mlb.mlb.com/device-config/v1/mlbtv-messages/en-US/tvos-v2.json QA http://qa.mlb.com/device-config/v1/mlbtv-messages/en-US/tvos-v2.json

title: Too Many Users - Video Launch via Home Team
custom_steps: WHEN we visit Home Team view AND attempt to launch or view a game in the video tile
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the "Too Many Users" message overlay: "Your account is currently in use at another location. Reset your password by logging in to MLB.com, click on 'My Profile' and change your password."

title: Too Many Users - Video Launch via Scores
custom_steps: WHEN we visit Scores view AND attempt to launch a game
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the "Too Many Users" message overlay: "Your account is currently in use at another location. Reset your password by logging in to MLB.com, click on 'My Profile' and change your password."

title: Verify Scores opens to the current Day <needs editing>
custom_steps: WHEN we press the Triangle button to open up the Menu AND we highlight and select Scores
custom_expected: THEN Screen updates to display the current day's game schedule, with Today's date AND Arrow buttons (on either side of month) for navigating to previous/next AND Tiles of games scheduled for the current day

title: Verify arrow UI button navigates to previous and next months
custom_steps: WHEN we see the current day displayed AND we navigate to and select the on screen arrow buttons Left for previous month and Right for next month AND we navigate back though the months and then forward through the months to the beginning/end of what is available.
custom_expected: THEN we see the screen updates to correctly display all text, buttons and design elements of the previous month(s) when Left arrow is selected AND we see the screen updates to correctly display all text, buttons and design elements of the next month(s) when Right arrow is selected

title: Verify Calendar Team Selector correctly displays
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to and activate the Date button AND we see the Team Picker button has the text "All Teams" AND we navigate to and activate Team Picker button in the upper left corner
custom_expected: THEN we see the screen update to display Team Picker menu: navigable list of all teams and an "All Teams" entry at the top AND we can navigate to and choose each team on the list and their calendar loads without issue and appears correct

title: **Verify Team Calendar correctly displays selected team's scheduled games
custom_steps: 1. From Home, select Calendar 2. Select Calendar view Option button in the upper left corner (text reads: ALL TEAMS) 3. Choose Team
custom_expected: Screen updates to display the current month's game schedule, with Today's date marked. Team Calendar displays: - Calendar View Option button displays Team logo and name - Month - Arrow buttons (on either side of month) for navigating to previous/next month - Days of the week - Day tiles with scheduled game(s)- (if any)

title: Verify Future Game Tiles do not have Active Feeds
custom_steps: WHEN we activate any game tile in the future
custom_expected: THEN the Feed Select window will appear, but no Feeds will be available

title: **Verify Calendar allows navigation to previous (2) seasons & current
custom_steps: Test case steps not provided
custom_expected: Test case expected result provided

title: Scores: All available games presented on TODAY are able to be selected
custom_steps: WHEN we attempt to navigate to games on today's date that have media attached (live/VOD as available) AND we activate the game tile
custom_expected: THEN all **expected** game tiles can be opened to FEED SELECT _Note: In ST some games may not have media present_

title: Scores: All the games shown are presented correctly on-screen based off MLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN we compare TODAY's Schedule at https://www.mlb.com with the Scores View displayed games
custom_expected: THEN the schedules match

title: Scores: Each game tile presents the away team first and the home team second
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the HOME and AWAY feeds
custom_expected: THEN we see Away feed 1st on the left, Home feed 2nd on the right AND the associated team logos match correct Away/Home expected teams (Note: this is typically an issue with new MLB rewrites only, the Home and Away don't match or are displayed on the wrong sides)

title: Scores: User is able to access all available archive games in the present year and two previous seasons
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate via Calendar to a ST game and a Regular Season game for the current Season and the two previous seasons AND we launch at least one of each available example* *Current Regular Season games are not available during ST - and some tiles in ST may not have Media attached
custom_expected: THEN each the of available games can be accessed and launched

title: Scores: FGotD Banner seen as expected
custom_steps: Confirm FGotD banner appears for: 1. Upcoming games 2. Live games 3. Archive current season 4. Archive previous Seasons offered
custom_expected: FGotD banner always appears

title: Game State: Scheduled
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Preview" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Scheduled"
custom_expected: THEN we will see upcoming time when the game is scheduled to begin on the game tile

title: Game State: Warmup
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Warmup"
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND the "Warmup" text

title: Game State: Pre-Game
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Preview" AND the "detailedState:" is set to "Pre-Game" AND we activate the game tile to bring up the Feed Selection window
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Pre-Game" text on the Feed Selection window

title: Game State: Delayed Start
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Preview" AND the "detailedState:" is set to "Delayed Start" AND we activate the game tile to bring up the Feed Selection window
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Delayed Start" text in grey on the Feed Selection window

title: Game State: In Progress (TOP)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the current inning is at the TOP of the inning
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND the blue triangle icon with the tip pointed up with the current inning number (EX: â–² 2nd)

title: Game State: In Progress (Mid)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the current inning is at the Middle of the inning
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND the text Mid with the current inning number (EX: Mid 4th)

title: Game State: In Progress (BOT)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the current inning is at the BOTTOM
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND the blue triangle icon with the tip pointed down with the current inning number (EX: â–¼ 6th)

title: Game State: In Progress (End)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the current inning is at the End
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND the text End with the current inning number (EX: End 8th)

title: Game State: In Progress (Extra Innings)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the amount of innings is currently greater than 9
custom_expected: THEN we will see the text LIVE in blue AND the current inning number with indicator for top (â–²), middle, bottom (â–¼), or end (EX: â–¼ 12th)

title: Game State: In-Game, Delayed
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Delayed"
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Delayed" text on the game tile

title: Game State: Manager Challenge
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Manager Challenge"
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Manager Challenge" text on the game tile

title: Game State: Review
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Review"
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Review" text on the game tile

title: Game State: Final
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Final" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Final" (or "Game Over")
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Final" text on the game tile AND the final Score of the game correctly attributed to each team AND we see the Winning pitcher's last name, first initial followed by their stats in parentheses AND underneath that we see the Losing pitcher's last name, first initial followed by their stats in parentheses

title: Game State: Final (Completed Early)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Final" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Completed Early" AND the game tile is activated to open the Feed selection window
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Final" text on the game tile AND the Feed Selection window will have the text "Completed Early" under the score at the top middle of the window

title: Game State: Final with a Save
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Final" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Game Over" AND the winning team's pitcher is credited with a Save
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Final" text on the game tile AND the pitcher who recorded the Save is credited at the bottom of the tile with the text "SV:" followed by their last name, first initial and number of saves so far this season in parentheses (EX: SV: Melancon, M (1))

title: Game Start: Final (Extra Innings)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Final" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Game Over" AND the amount of innings played was greater than 9
custom_expected: THEN we will see the Final Score on the game tile AND the text "Final/" and the inning number where the game ended after the "/" (EX: Final/13)

title: Game State: Postponed (Text between teams, reason below)
custom_steps: WHEN the abstractGameState: is set to "Final" AND the detailedState: is set to "Postponed" AND the reason: is set to "Rain" (or similar reason) AND the game tile is activated to open the Feed selection window
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Postponed" text on the game tile between the two teams' logos AND we will see the reason text at the bottom (EX: Rain) AND when the game tile is activated we will see the "Postponed" text under the score at the top middle of the window

title: Game State: Suspended
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Suspended"
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND we will see the "Suspended" text on the game tile at the bottom middle

title: Game State: Cancelled (Red text between teams, reason below)
custom_steps: WHEN the abstractGameState: is set to "Final" AND the detailedState: is set to â€œCancelled" AND the reason: is set to "Rain" (or similar reason) AND the game tile is activated to open the Feed selection window
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Cancelled" text in red on the game tile between the two teams' logos AND we will see the reason text at the bottom (EX: Rain) AND when the game tile is activated we will see the "Cancelled" text under the score at the top middle of the window

title: Game State: Forfeit (any reason)
custom_steps: WHEN the abstractGameState: is set to "Final" AND the detailedState: is set to â€œForfeitâ€￾ AND the reason: is set to â€œEjectionâ€￾ (or similar reason) AND the game tile is activated to open the Feed selection window
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Forfeit" text on the game tile between the two teams' logos AND we will see the reason text at the bottom (EX: Ejection) AND when the game tile is activated we will see the "Forfeit" text under the score at the top middle of the window

title: Game State: Scheduled
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Preview" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Scheduled"
custom_expected: THEN we will see upcoming time when the game is scheduled to begin on the game tile

title: Game State: Warmup
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Warmup"
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND we will NOT see the "Warmup" text

title: Game State: Pre-Game
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Preview" AND the "detailedState:" is set to "Pre-Game" AND we highlight the Game Tile
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Pre-Game" text on the Game Tile while highlighted

title: Game State: Delayed Start
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Preview" AND the "detailedState:" is set to "Delayed Start" AND we activate the game tile to bring up the Feed Selection window
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Delayed Start" text in grey on the Feed Selection window

title: Game State: In Progress (TOP)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the current inning is at the TOP of the inning
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND we will NOT see the blue triangle icon with the tip pointed up with the current inning number (EX: â–² 2nd)

title: Game State: In Progress (Mid)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the current inning is at the Middle of the inning
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND we will NOT see the text Mid with the current inning number (EX: Mid 4th)

title: Game State: In Progress (BOT)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the current inning is at the BOTTOM
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND we will NOT see the blue triangle icon with the tip pointed down with the current inning number (EX: â–¼ 6th)

title: Game State: In Progress (End)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the current inning is at the End
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "LIVE" text in blue on the game tile AND we will NOT see the text End with the current inning number (EX: End 8th)

title: Game State: In Progress (Extra Innings)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "In Progress" AND the amount of innings is currently greater than 9
custom_expected: THEN we will see the text LIVE in blue AND we will NOT see the current inning number with an indicator for top (â–²), middle, bottom (â–¼), or end (EX: â–¼ 12th)

title: Game State: In-Game, Delayed
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Delayed"
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see the "Delayed" text on the game tile

title: Game State: Manager Challenge
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Manager Challenge"
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see the "Manager Challenge" text on the game tile

title: Game State: Review
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Live" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Review"
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see the "Review" text on the game tile

title: Game State: Final
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Final" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Final" (or "Game Over")
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Final" text on the game tile AND the final Score of the game won't be shown AND the text "Hide Scores: On" will be shown above the text "Turn off in Settings"

title: Game State: Final (Completed Early)
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Final" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Completed Early" AND the game tile is activated to open the Feed selection window
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Final" text on the game tile AND the final Score of the game won't be shown AND the text "Hide Scores: On" will be shown above the text "Turn off in Settings" AND the Feed Selection window will have the text "Completed Early" under the score at the top middle of the window

title: Game State: Final with a Save
custom_steps: WHEN the "abstractGameState:" is set to "Final" AND "detailedState:" is set to "Game Over" AND the winning team's pitcher is credited with a Save
custom_expected: THEN we will see the "Final" text on the game tile AND we will see no additional information regarding the pitcher who recorded the Save

title: Game Start: Final (Extra Innings)

custom_expected: THEN we will see the text "Final" AND the extra innings will not be shown AND the text "Hide Scores: On" will be shown above the text "Turn off in Settings"

title: Wild Card Enabled in Config

custom_expected: Then the user will see Division Standings and Wildcard Standings options

title: Wild Card On - Standings Button Activation
custom_steps: When the user launches the app And navigates to Settings > Standings And activates the Standings button
custom_expected: Then the Main Menu buttons will shift up and out of view And the Division Standings button will be highlighted And the user will see Division Standings and Wildcard Standings options in the correct view, shifted up and all items visible

title: Wild Card Enabled - Toggle

custom_expected: Then the user will be able to toggle between Division and Wild Card Standings And each will reflect the actual associated Standings And each will appear as expected And Wild Card Standings reflect actual standings: http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/wildcard.jsp And the Division Standings are also accurate: http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/index.jsp

title: Wild Card Enabled - In-session persistence
custom_steps: When the user launches the app And navigates to Settings > Standings And the user sees Division Standings and Wildcard Standings options And the user navigates to Wild Card view And the user leaves Standings with Wild Card enabled And the user views Games View, Highlights View and Settings And plays at least one video And returns to Standings
custom_expected: Then the user will see Wild Card Standings still enabled

title: Wild Card Enabled - Quit Refresh
custom_steps: When the user launches the app And navigates to Settings > Standings And the user sees Division Standings and Wildcard Standings options And the user navigates to Wild Card view And the user hard quits app (nav to tvOS Home, double-press Home button on remote, flick app page up to quit) And the user relaunches the app
custom_expected: Then the user will see Division Standings enabled

title: Descriptive Text
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to Create a FREE account button
custom_expected: THEN we see "Create a FREE MLB account to watch the Free Game of the Day." text on the left side of the screen

title: Create Free MLB.TV account - opt in newsletter
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter an email address
AND create a PW 8-15 characters in length with at least one upper-case letter, one lowercase letter and one number
AND confirm password

AND user ensures the opt-in box is checked
custom_expected:
THEN the app logs the user in
AND the user's email account does show an opt-in to receive the newsletter

To confirm this, user must forward opted-in email account to CDQA member with Rodeo Tool access (Brandon/Tree) asking them to confirm that it has been tagged with opt-in group â€œ428â€￾.

title: Create Free MLB.TV account - opt out of newsletter
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter an email address
AND create a PW 8-15 characters in length with at least one upper-case letter, one lowercase letter and one number
AND confirm password

AND user ensures the opt-in box is not checked
custom_expected: THEN the app logs the user in AND the user's email account does not show an opt-in to receive the newsletter To confirm this, user must forward opted-in email account to CDQA member with Rodeo Tool access (Brandon/Tree) asking them to confirm that it has NOT been tagged with opt-in group â€œ428â€￾.

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Email
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an invalid email AND any password 8-15 Characters in length & proper format (one number/upper-case letter/lower-case letter) AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error overlay: _Invalid Email - Please enter a valid email address_ AND this can be dismissed AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Length
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a valid email address
AND any password in violation of the requirements - 8-15 Characters in length, one number, at least one upper-case & one lower-case letter
AND we activate Sign In

__Note: App input does not allow passwords >15 characters in length__

Examples: qwerty1234 Qwerty Qwertyuiop 12345678
custom_expected:
THEN the app shows an error overlay for length violation:
_Password Length - Password must be at least 8 and no more than 15 characters_
AND this can be dismissed
AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Bad Format
custom_steps: WHEN we enter a valid email address AND any password 8-15 Characters in length BUT in violation of the requirements (missing requirement of one number, at least one upper-case & one lower-case letter) AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error overlay for length violation: _Password too simple - Password must at east one character, one number, one uppercase letter and one lowercase letter_ AND this can be dismissed AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Existing Account
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an existing MLB.com email AND any password 8-15 Characters in length & proper format (one number/upper-case letter/lower-case letter) AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error overlay: _TBD - Registration Failure_ AND this can be dismissed AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Account to App at Login - Favorites Added
custom_steps: 1. In Settings, activate Log In 2. Login to profile account and close Activation Message 3. In Settings activate Pick Favorite Teams
custom_expected: Account-set favorite teams are tagged

title: Account to App at Login - Favorites Updated
custom_steps: 1. In Settings, choose Pick Favorite Teams 2. Choose 2 favorites that are not the same as the account-set favorite teams and note them 3. Back out to Settings and activate Login 4. Login to profile account and close Activation Message 5. Return to Pick Favorite Teams page
custom_expected: Account-set favorite teams are tagged, previous set teams are cleared - both Web and Device match

title: App to Account and Account to App Connection
custom_steps: 1. In Settings activate Login 2. Login to profile account and close Activation Message 3. Activate Pick Favorite Teams 4. Choose >1 team and note 5. Back out to Settings and Quit App (adding this in for 2016, see Expected results note) 6. Via alt computer/device, login to same MLB.com account and check profile https://secure.mlb.com/account/profile.jsp 7. Change teams and note 8. Launch app and nav to Settings 9. In app Settings page, activate Change Favorite Teams and observe
custom_expected: Teams added via app appear as expected, adjustments made in account via MLB.com user profile page are relayed to app and appear as expected

title: Descriptive Text
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the App Start View button
custom_expected: THEN we see the following text on the left side of the screen: "Tailor your experience! Launch the MLB App directly to your preferred view: Home (favorite team) or Scores (league). Your Home view is based on your Favorite team. Change it anytime in Settings."

title: Appearance and Toggle
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the App Start View button AND we press enter several times
custom_expected: THEN we see the text toggle between "Home View" and "Scores View"

title: Scores View - Launch after Hard Quit
custom_steps: WHEN we quit the app AND relaunch
custom_expected: THEN the app launches to TODAY in Scores View
